ygData.subject: Re: Zones zones Zones
ygData.msgSnippet: I m afraid by the time RoK comes out half the population will be lvl 50s that have sold their accounts to ppl that don t know how to play a lvl 50. -Sartori
ygData.messageBody:
I'm afraid by the time RoK comes out half the population will be lvl 50s
that have sold their accounts to ppl that don't know how to play a lvl 50.

-Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Quellious of the 50th Chorus
-Stace Stormraven
Druid of Tunare of the 26th Circle
Veeshan Server


>From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Zones zones Zones
>Date: Thu, 2 Dec 1999 01:16:50 -0600
>
>re: Kith
>If they make all the undead despawn at dawn, I think that would solve the
>problem. Just don't enter the place at night. :)
>
>re: new zone locations
>The badlads in the Dakotas are quite interesting, terrain wise. Be nice if
>they reproduced something like that.
>Dead Hills.. hopefully that doens't refer to players. heheh.
>Is there a zone that encompasses the Unkempt Woods or the Jaggedpine
>forest?
>I'm guessing the unkempt druids are in the unkempt woods (living in unkempt
>houses, no doubt).
>
>The Ruins of Kunark is supposed to have 20 zones in it or so I've heard.
>Unfortunately it won't be out until March of next year. By which time,
>unless they've added new zones, half the server population will be level 50
>with nothing to do. :)
>
>-Gaelaian, sleepy bard of the 19th song, Tunare.
